comments.content:
It could be **[Graphik (Medium Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142307/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=CommercialType%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Graphik%20-%20Medium%20Italic&fid=02be202b738e7ef78f49ecd053cf9a6b&fsize=60&text=ALL%20RIGHTS%20RESERVED&fit=1)** by Commercial Type [2009]  
(Your sample looks a bit bolder, because of the white letters on black background)
